Lyrics:
1 ContributorCollapse in the Key of fireworks LyricsI walk
Vision’s flattening
Stop from underneath
I’ve been shifting, stumbling, body’s numb control means nothing
Oh how will this end

Break
Heartbeat’s dampening
Catch this with my teeth
I’m counting the minutes
The red tape’s calling
Oh how will this end

It’s on the arm for you
Don't fucking move, listen

My head is split
System is blistered
I know what failure is
I’m not convinced
Bleeding ourselves when solutions don’t fit

I give the question back
Suffer through the times spent waiting for the blackout
All signs are pointed to a fake monument of wings, snakes, circling the body
You might also likeTime is distorting around me
Scarring reveals every truth
I can’t recall the start and the end of it all
The light separates into colors in the shape of youEmbed
